thread.section_title: Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent | upad.co.uk
thread.title: Richard Parry
thread.title_full: Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent reviewed by Richard Parry

author: Richard Parry
title: Richard Parry
text: After a few weeks of free advertising at Gumtree and some shady enquiries I opted to return to Upad and purchase a block booking to find a tenant for my newly renovated house. The email and mobile numbers for 4 potential tenants arrived within hours and the follow up was just as efficient. Their website to insert an ad is simple to follow and produces a result comparable with the best commercial letting agents. Great service, will use them again to avoid the time wasters.
